title: Retro video game Digger gets remade - but this time you can use it on your smartphone
text:
Welcome to Digger, it’s 1983!
This game is a great classic from the days of Return of the Jedi, Michael Jackson’s Thriller album and a lot of verbal sparring between Washington and Moscow.
Oh well, some things don’t change.
Back in the day, Digger was one of the games that set the games industry on its way.
It’s still fantastically addictive and great to play. Click here to download.
Simply dig your way round the screens and drop bags of gold to collect later.
Watch out for your enemies though, you’ll need to kill them off before they get you.
Look for the cherries which gives up the best bonus.
Post your score and show your friends just how good a miner you are.
Click here to download.
When this game originally launched it would have run on an ancient PC.
Today, Mirror Games brings you an original game, just as it played all those years ago, but on mobile and with the latest controls to make it more enjoyable.
Start playing now by downloading the app here.
As we’ve put the Mirror Games magic on the game to get the best from today’s smartphones we make a small charge of 99p.
Once installed, there are no in-app purchases, the game is all yours to enjoy.
This game is only available to Android users, but iPhone users needn't panic, we’ll have compatible versions for all Mirror Games available for you very soon.
Keep coming back for news and more information on new game releases.
So whatever game you like to play, our aim is to make sure it’s available on Mirror Games.
We welcome your feedback, so please feel free to email us: feedback@mirrorgames.com.
